title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 288: Featuring Kevin Hayes Live From The NHL Bubble
description:
On Monday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Kevin Hayes live from the NHL bubble in Toronto. Hayesy joined (46:19) to talk about the bubble, the Habs, who is bad at Xbox and COD on the Flyers and a bunch more. The boys also preview all the 2nd round series and wrap up some of the 1st round series. The fellas finish up talking about the Caps firing Todd Reirden, the Boston trip, Mike Milbury, and some more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
